metadata.title: Tuesday, 12th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when the civic centre, market and staff houses in Sikongo District will be constructed.

parts: (a)    when the Zambia National Broadcasting Corporation Television will start broadcasting its programmes for twenty-four hours a day country-wide; and
(b)    when remote areas in the country that do not receive any television signal will start receiving it.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the total number of pupils enrolled at Sesheke Basic School was as of 30th September, 2013;
(b)    whether the Government is aware that health authorities in the District declared the ablution block at the School to be unsuitable for use by the pupils;
(c)    when a new ablution block will be constructed; and

(d)    when more teachers’ houses will be constructed at the school.
